thread.title: WTF | Dublin Bus falls for a Back To The Future-related prank
thread.title_full: WTF | Dublin Bus falls for a Back To The Future-related prank - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: WTF | Dublin Bus falls for a Back To The Future-related prank
text:
Ah, lads. Come on.
Martin Joyce decided to have a little fun on his way to work (presumably) and send Dublin Bus' official Twitter account a little joke-tweet.
Gonna be late for work ð feckin delorean car appeared out of nowhere and crashed into our @dublinbusnews #BackToTheFutureDay
— Martin Joyce (@funjicey) October 21, 2015 As luck would have it, Dublin Bus came back straight away - and totally missed the joke in its entirety.
@funjicey Hi Martin, what bus are you on, where is the bus now and what direction are you travelling?
— Dublin Bus (@dublinbusnews) October 21, 2015 Ooof. Come on, folks. Look at the date. Look at Twitter. Surely someone must have clocked (heh) what day it was.
Any excuse to play this again.
Via Twitter
